lead_paragraph: GUEOVJIAN--John, of The Landings on Skidaway Island, Savannah, GA, formerly of Pelham Manor, NY, died on Saturday, May 21, 2016. John is survived by his wife, Lynette Love; two daughters, Marion (Erich) Altvater, of Woodbridge, Connecticut; Denise (Steve) Miller and their daughters, Anna and Bethie Miller of Skillman, New Jersey. Remembrances may be made in John's Memory to Hospice Savannah, Inc., P.O. Box 13190, Savannah, GA 31406. Please sign our on-line guestbook at: foxandweeks.com Fox & Weeks Funeral Directors, Hodgson Chapel is in charge of services. 1/3
